name: The Warm Light House
description:
From $15.99 Now only $11.99!!

"When I stepped outside, turning back after waving a long postponed goodbye to the warm light house, an endeared chipmunk stopped on my way, looking at me with his small hands over his little heart."

This illustrated book is a sensorial memoir through those simple little things that matter most. Disguised as Children's Literature, the story is good for readers of all ages! Language: It's an English-Portuguese bilingual edition Format: 11"x8" Pages: 48 full-colored pages long For more info click here :)
